name: Once Upon a Child
description:
"My name is Mi."
 Synopsis

Mi, a 10-year old girl in elementary school, is bullied in class by the other pupils because of her name. One day, the teacher comes up with an essay: "Write a story about yourself!" Completely clueless about what to write, she will have three days to finish her homework, helped by her father and Wendy, her only friend...

Once Upon a Child is a ~25 minutes long visual novel, made in RPG Maker MV for the Indie Game Maker Contest 2017. 

Features
  • A 50k characters-long story
  • A vertically-oriented screen, to simulate good old pages of paper
  • A writing-based choice system
  • 4 different endings depending on the words chosen
  • A "Notes" menu with the notes of the author + A sound test
